title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions:
Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, the ultimate portable speaker for all your audio needs! Whether you're traveling, enjoying the great outdoors, or lounging by the pool, this sleek black speaker is your perfect companion.

Experience deep, clear, and immersive audio with exclusive PositionIQ technology and custom-engineered transducer. With its waterproof rating of IP67, this speaker is designed to float on water, resist dust, shock, corrosion, and even UV light. 

Enjoy up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge with the rechargeable lithium-ion battery and USB-C charging cable. The built-in microphone allows for hands-free calls and access to virtual assistants like Siri and Google Assistant.

The Bose Connect App provides additional support and allows for customizable settings. With a connection range of up to 30 feet, this speaker is perfect for on-the-go use. Don't miss out on the unmatched sound quality and durability of the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - get yours today!

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker in sleek Black! This portable speaker with a built-in microphone is perfect for all your travel, outdoor, and pool adventures. With deep, clear, and immersive audio quality powered by exclusive PositionIQ technology and custom-engineered transducers, you'll be blown away by the sound.

Not only is this speaker waterproof with an IP67 rating, but it also floats on water, making it ideal for pool parties or beach days. Its durability is unmatched with dust, shock, corrosion, and UV light resistance. The lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hours of playtime and charges quickly with a USB-C cable in just 4 hours.

Stay connected with Bluetooth technology and enjoy hands-free calls with the built-in microphone. Access Siri or Google Assistant easily and customize your settings with the Bose Connect App. Plus, its compact design and utility loop make it easy to carry and secure wherever you go.

Don't miss out on this versatile and high-quality Bluetooth speaker that's designed to enhance your outdoor experiences. Upgrade to the Bose SoundLink Flex today!

Immerse yourself in deep, clear audio with exclusive PositionIQ technology and a custom-engineered transducer. The built-in microphone allows for hands-free calls and access to virtual assistants like Siri and Google Assistant. 

With up to 12 hours of battery life and a quick charging time of approximately 4 hours via USB-C cable, you can enjoy uninterrupted music on-the-go. The compact design and utility loop make it easy to carry and store, while the durable construction ensures resistance to water, dust, shocks, corrosion, and UV light. 

Experience the freedom of wireless connectivity within a range of up to 30 feet and take advantage of the Bose Connect App for customizable settings and software updates. Elevate your outdoor experience with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - your perfect travel companion!

Durability is key with this speaker - it's dust, shock, and corrosion resistant, so you can take it anywhere without worry. The compact design and utility loop make it easy to carry and store, while the long-lasting battery life of up to 12 hours ensures you can enjoy your favorite tunes all day long. 

Get the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker today and take your music on the move!
